name: sitecore-marketing-automation-sample-plugin
description: A sample seed project to create Sitecore Marketing Automation activity plugin

scripts.postdev: rimraf ./codegen && npm run rename && ngc -p ./src/tsconfig.aot.json && rimraf ./codegen-temp
scripts.rename: node -e "require('fs').rename('./codegen-temp', './codegen', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Folder successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.build: npm run dev && npm run webpack
scripts.buildandpublish: npm rum build && npm run publish

author: Jaspal Singh <pal.singh1989@gmail.com>
